welcome.title: Welcome to {{appName}}!
welcome.onboardingInfo: We need a bit more info before you can continue. Please select your account type below:

roleSelector.companyDescription: Looking to hire talent, post projects, or collaborate with skilled professionals
roleSelector.candidateDescription: Looking for job opportunities, courses, or to showcase your skills to companies

companyForm.logoHelp: Upload a square logo, preferably 512x512px or larger
companyForm.contactInfoRequired: At least one contact method is required

productLaunchEvent.title: SkillBridge Product Launch Meetup
productLaunchEvent.description: Join us for the official launch of SkillBridge - our revolutionary platform connecting students with real-world company projects. Be the first to see our platform in action, network with industry professionals, and learn how SkillBridge is transforming the internship experience.

speakers.title: Featured Speakers
speakers.description: Learn from industry experts and the minds behind SkillBridge

aiCourse.title: Modern Software Development with AI
aiCourse.description: Master AI-assisted development with tools like GitHub Copilot, Claude, ChatGPT. Learn about MPC servers, no-code/low-code platforms, and modern IDEs that will revolutionize your workflow and productivity as a developer.
aiCourse.longDescription: This comprehensive course will transform the way you develop software by leveraging the latest AI tools and technologies. You'll learn how to use AI assistants to write better code, understand MPC (Multi-Party Computation) server technology, explore no-code and low-code platforms, and master modern IDEs that boost your productivity.
aiCourse.instructorBio: Alex has over 15 years of software development experience and is a pioneer in AI-assisted development techniques. He's worked with major tech companies to implement AI tools into their development workflows and is passionate about teaching others how to leverage these powerful technologies.
learningPoints: How to effectively use AI coding assistants like GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, and Claude
Understanding MPC (Multi-Party Computation) servers and their applications
No-code and low-code platform development for rapid prototyping
Mastering modern IDEs and productivity tools
Best practices for prompt engineering when working with code-focused LLMs
Building a complete project using AI-assisted development techniques

modules.title: Mastering GitHub Copilot & LLMs for Coding
Capstone Project: Building with AI Assistance

requirementsList: Basic programming knowledge in any language
Computer capable of running modern IDEs
Open mind and willingness to learn new ways of developing software
aiCourse.enrolled: You are already enrolled in this course

categories.developmentDesc: Build digital products with cutting-edge technologies
categories.designDesc: Create beautiful user experiences and visual identities
categories.marketingDesc: Drive growth and engagement through creative campaigns
categories.contentDesc: Craft compelling stories across various media formats
categories.architectureDesc: Design innovative spaces and sustainable structures
categories.agenciesDesc: Collaborate with full-service creative and technical agencies

hero.title: The Bridge Between Education and Success
hero.subtitle: By students for students - where knowledge meets opportunities and careers are born

problem.title: The Problem We Solve
problem.point1: Companies struggle to find suitable interns and entry-level talent with real practical skills.
problem.point2: Young people and career-oriented candidates lack easy access to meaningful internships.
problem.point3: Traditional courses don't provide direct connections to real business experience and employment.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description1: SkillBridge is a platform where companies publish real project assignments, accessible as a project board with project requirement assignments. Candidates choose an assignment, develop a solution, and upload it to the system. Approved candidates gain access to a company culture and onboarding course with validation tests.
solution.description2: After the course, the results are sent to the company, which can invite the best candidates for interviews and hiring.

categories.title: Discover Projects by Category
categories.subtitle: Explore opportunities in different industries and find your path

partners.title: Leading Organizations Choose Us
partners.subtitle: Join these innovative companies that trust our platform to connect with top talent

cta.title: Ready to Transform the Internship and Hiring Process?
cta.subtitle: Join SkillBridge today and be part of the future of education and hiring

companiesPage.subtitle: Discover the innovative companies that trust our platform to connect with top talent and drive their success forward.
companiesPage.searchPlaceholder: Search companies by name, industry or keywords...

courses.headerDescription: Browse our library of expert-led courses designed to enhance your skills and advance your career in tech, design, business, and more.

hero.description: With SkillBridge, you don't just work on real projects - you gain exclusive access to company-specific courses that prepare you for immediate employment. Master the exact skills companies are looking for.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Learn how our unique process connects project completion to exclusive learning opportunities and direct employment paths.

step1.title: Complete a Project
step1.description: Choose and complete a real-world project assignment from our projects board.

step2.title: Get Approved
step2.description: Have your project submission reviewed and approved by the company.

step3.title: Access Exclusive Course
step3.description: Gain access to company-specific courses designed to deepen your knowledge.

step4.title: Employment Opportunity
step4.description: After course completion, get considered for direct employment opportunities.

videoDemo.title: See the SkillBridge Journey
videoDemo.description: Watch how students go from project completion to employment through our platform.

benefits.title: Why Company Courses Matter
benefits.subtitle: Unlike generic online courses, our company-specific training provides unique advantages for your career:

direct.title: Direct Industry Relevance
direct.description: Learn exactly what companies need, taught by the professionals who work there every day.

certification.title: Company-Validated Certification
certification.description: Receive certifications that carry real weight with employers because they come directly from them.

culture.title: Cultural Onboarding
culture.description: Understand company culture, values, and working methods before you even start.

employment.title: Fast-Track to Employment
employment.description: Skip lengthy interview processes when companies already know your capabilities and fit.

sampleCourses.react: Learn advanced React patterns, state management strategies, and performance optimization techniques directly from our engineering team.
sampleCourses.ux: Master the research methodologies we use in our design process, from user interviews to usability testing and analysis.
sampleCourses.marketing: Develop comprehensive content marketing strategies that drive engagement, focusing on our proven multi-channel approach.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Begin by exploring our project board and find opportunities that match your skills and interests. Complete a project to unlock exclusive company courses.

projectsPage.subtitle: Find your next project challenge from various industries. Connect with innovative companies looking for your talent and expertise.
projectsPage.searchPlaceholder: Search projects by keyword or company name
projectsPage.trending: Trending: Mobile App, UX/UI, Content Strategy

hero.title: About SkillBridge
hero.subtitle: Empowering careers, connecting talent, and building a community of growth-minded professionals.

companies.title: For Companies
companies.subtitle: SkillBridge provides companies with efficient, automated tools to discover, evaluate, and connect with the best emerging talent in the market.

saveTime.title: Save Time & Resources
saveTime.description: Automated candidate evaluation eliminates manual screening processes.

objectiveAssessment.title: Objective Assessment
objectiveAssessment.description: AI-powered evaluation provides unbiased candidate analysis.

longTermConnections.title: Long-term Connections
longTermConnections.description: Build lasting relationships with emerging professionals.

innovativeReputation.title: Innovative Reputation
innovativeReputation.description: Build reputation as an innovative employer in the market.

reducedCosts.title: Reduced Costs
reducedCosts.description: Significantly reduce recruitment costs and overhead expenses.

defineNeed.title: Define Need
defineNeed.description: Specify your requirements for junior positions or projects

autoGenerate.title: Auto-Generate
autoGenerate.description: Platform creates tailored business cases for evaluation

reviewResults.title: Review Results
reviewResults.description: AI evaluates candidates and provides detailed analytics

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: Get matched with top performers for direct recruitment

students.title: For Students
students.subtitle: SkillBridge provides students with the tools, opportunities, and real-world experience needed to launch successful careers in their chosen fields.

realBusinessCases.title: Real Business Cases
realBusinessCases.description: Work on actual projects that companies need solved, not theoretical exercises.

skillDevelopment.title: Skill Development
skillDevelopment.description: Learn by doing in a real business environment with practical challenges.

supportivePlatform.title: Supportive Platform
supportivePlatform.description: Access a user-friendly platform designed to guide and support your growth.

directOpportunities.title: Direct Opportunities
directOpportunities.description: Get direct access to internship and job offers from participating companies.

projectPortfolio.title: Project Portfolio
projectPortfolio.description: Build a portfolio of completed real-world projects to showcase your abilities.

structuredFeedback.title: Structured Feedback
structuredFeedback.description: Receive detailed feedback and guidance to continuously improve your skills.

browseCases.title: Browse Cases
browseCases.description: Find real business challenges that match your skills and interests

applySolve.title: Apply & Solve
applySolve.description: Work on the case using your knowledge and creativity

getEvaluated.title: Get Evaluated
getEvaluated.description: Receive AI-powered assessment and detailed feedback

getHired.title: Get Hired
getHired.description: Top performers get direct contact from interested companies

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: We're a diverse group of passionate individuals committed to building a platform that makes a difference.

david_petkov.name: David Petkov
david_petkov.bio: With over 15 years of experience in tech and education, David founded Endorsify to bridge the gap between talent and opportunity.

david_hristov.name: David Hristov
david_hristov.bio: David leads our engineering team with expertise in scalable architectures, AI, and creating seamless user experiences.

trayan_vasilev.name: Trayan Vasilev
trayan_vasilev.bio: Trayan specializes in creating beautiful and intuitive user interfaces, focusing on modern frontend technologies and user experience design.

kristian.name: Kristian
kristian.bio: Kristian curates our educational content and courses, ensuring we provide cutting-edge learning experiences.

cta.title: Join Our Community
cta.subtitle: Be part of a growing network of professionals, companies, and educators working together to shape the future of careers.
